TopicTitle: DMP -- confused about how to set up and play with a friend

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

a friend and i have decided to play DMP because KMP is too laggy, after many attempts a few months ago we gave up but out of pure determination i still wanted to play!

unfortunately i cannot find a decent DMP server tutorial (not the dub step walkthroughs! AAH!) and i am asking help here

any step by step guide or easy to follow tutorial would be helpful, just please make it relevant to setting up and joining your own server and letting a friend join. And im sure other people are having issues as well.

Thanks, Irondeath
